title: Exquisite Polki Diamond Jhumka - A Timeless Telugu Vaibhavam
materials: adorned with Uncut Polki Diamonds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
lustrous finish. The Polki diamonds are of excellent clarity
features: Features a classic Jhumka silhouette, meticulously handcrafted with intricate openwork detailing. The design incorporates a floral stud, followed by a connecting element, culminating in a larger Jhumka bell. Each element is encrusted with Polki diamonds in a closed setting, reflecting light beautifully. The bottom features delicate pearl drops. Traditional craftsmanship evident in the precision of the setting and the overall design.
colors: with the natural white of the Polki diamonds creating a striking contrast against the warm yellow of the gold. The Hyderabadi Polish gives the gold a rich
occasions: and other special occasions. Adds a touch of traditional Telugu elegance to any outfit. Ideal for Muhurtham
and half-saree functions. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and festive celebrations.
description: This Jhumka embodies timeless Telugu tradition, crafted with authentic Polki diamonds and meticulous attention to detail. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's natural luster, creating a piece that exudes luxury and sophistication. The use of uncut Polki diamonds ensures that each piece is unique, a testament to the wearer's individuality and refined taste. A true heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
